headline: Blackstone: Taking Profit On Sharp Rally And Recycling Capital (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Blackstone stock downgrade to "Sell" due to elevated downside risk and market sentiment; reassess if a 15%-20% pullback occurs. Explore more here.

headline: Why I Stopped Buying Rental Properties To Buy REITs Instead
summary: I have switched from rental properties to REITs for most of my investments. Read here for an analysis of pros and cons of my REIT investments.

headline: He Bought a Sub Shop as a Teen. Now He’s Selling Jersey Mike’s for $8 Billion.
summary: Peter Cancro started slinging subs at his local shop at 14. Now he’s selling the national chain he built to Blackstone.
